name: Valkyrie Command
description:
Valkyrie Command! A little boss rush game made for the MechJam II.

Game extremely inspired by Rym 9000

Mouse required to play.

Year: 20XX. After fighting off what seems to be aimless intergalactic invasions Mankind has been brought to the brink of collapse. 2 years after the first invasion 12 unknown floating structures have descended onto Earth. The Government foreseeing any forthcoming disaster deploy all Military Mech Units (M.M.Us) to investigate, offering large reward money to any mercenary mechs willing to aid in the fight. Out of all mercenary's assisting in the operation only 1 has made it close enough to discover the true purpose for the structure...

Music By Marrow: https://twitter.com/prodmarrow

Marrow's Itch Page: https://prodmarrow.itch.io/

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
